All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiGatewayApplication
 
Auditable
A base class for entities that need to be audited.
Availability
An enum representing the availability status of a Representative entity.
BestProtocolApplication
 
BestProtocolApplicationTests
 
ControllerExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for controller layer.
ControllerExceptionHandlerTest
This class contains test methods for the ControllerExceptionHandler class.
DataLoader
 
DiscoveryServerApplication
 
ErrorCode
An enumeration of error codes that can be used in the response body of exceptions.
Government
Represents a government entity in the system with an automatically generated unique identifier (id) inherited from IdentifierLong.
GovernmentController
Rest Controller that handles requests related to governments.
GovernmentControllerIT
Integration test class for the GovernmentController.
GovernmentRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Government entity.
GovernmentService
Service class for managing Government and its translations.
GovernmentTranslation
Represents a translation of a Government entity in a specific language.
GovernmentTranslationRepository
Spring Data JPA repository for the GovernmentTranslation entity.
Identifier
A base class for entities that have an ID field.
IdentifierLong
A base class for entities that have a Long ID as their primary key.
ImageUtil
A utility class for compressing and decompressing images using the Deflater and Inflater classes.
ImageUtilTest
This class contains test cases for the ImageUtil class.
Mapper
The Mapper class is a utility class used for mapping between entities and models, as well as mapping individual fields between them.
MapperTest
This class contains JUnit test cases for the Mapper class that is responsible for mapping various entity objects to their respective models.
MenuTranslation
Represents a translation for a menu item.
MenuTranslationController
Controller for retrieving menu translation information.
MenuTranslationControllerIT
Integration test for MenuTranslationController.
MenuTranslationRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on MenuTranslation entities in the database.
MenuTranslationService
Service class that provides methods for retrieving and manipulating the Menu tranlation.
PreviousJobTitleTranslation
Entity class representing the previous job title translation.
PreviousJobTitleTranslationRepository
Repository interface for accessing and manipulating PreviousJobTitleTranslation entities.
Representative
An entity class that represents a representative.
RepresentativeController
REST controller for managing government representatives.
RepresentativeControllerIT
This class represents integration tests for the RepresentativeController class.
RepresentativeRepository
This repository interface provides access to the "representative" table in the database.
RepresentativeService
Service class that handles operations related to government representatives.
RepresentativeTranslation
An entity representing a translation of a Representative object.
RepresentativeTranslationRepository
This repository interface extends JpaRepository for CRUD operations on RepresentativeTranslation entities.
